nodes.bodyText:
I don't understand the reasoning behind removing the check, is the check necessary or not?
If it is needed, why not fix the NullPointerException? If it was not needed, then why was it added in the first place?

isBasicInfo default value will be false, once we create study and click on Mark as completed isBasicInfo will set to true.
Next time when user edit the study, we were checking
if(! studySequenceBo.isBasicInfo() && StringUtils.isNotEmpty(studyBo.getButtonText()) && studyBo.getButtonText() .equalsIgnoreCase(FdahpStudyDesignerConstants.COMPLETED_BUTTON))  .Since it was true, it will not go inside if check
so removed !studySequenceBo.isBasicInfo() and kept only
if(StringUtils.isNotEmpty(studyBo.getButtonText()) && studyBo.getButtonText() .equalsIgnoreCase(FdahpStudyDesignerConstants.COMPLETED_BUTTON))
